sentences.en: “give individual schools the right to opt out of the local educational authority”(&b{Newsweek})
sentences.cn: “给予每一学校有脱离地方教育行政体系的权利”(&b{新闻周刊})

sentences.en: Depending on your circumstances you can opt for one method or the other.
sentences.cn: 根据自己的情况，你可以选择这种或那种方法。

sentences.en: Everyone can opt for a good novel.
sentences.cn: 每人可以选一本好的小说.

sentences.en: Half of California's deceased opt for cremation.
sentences.cn: 加利福尼亚州有一半的亡故者选择火葬。

sentences.en: He took one sip of the wine and opt it out.
sentences.cn: 他喝了一点点酒,马上就吐了出来.

sentences.en: He's been authorised to co-opt anyone he wants to join him.
sentences.cn: 他得到授权可以挑选自己想要的任何人加入他的团队。

sentences.en: Many say that, given a choice, they would opt for a holiday to put the pep back in their lives.
sentences.cn: 很多人说，要是能选择，他们宁愿选择休假来恢复活力。

sentences.en: Most people opt for buying their own homes rather than renting them.
sentences.cn: 大多数人愿意买房子而不愿意租房子.

sentences.en: Mr Wallace tries to co-opt rather than defeat his critics.
sentences.cn: 华莱士先生竭力拉拢而不是击败他的批评者们。

sentences.en: Objective The anti carcinoma pattern of hydroxy camptothecin ( OPT ) is estimated and guided to clinical medication.
sentences.cn: 目的:预测羟基喜树碱 ( OPT ) 的抗癌谱,指导临床用药.

sentences.en: People still opt for monogamy and marriage.
sentences.cn: 人们仍然选择一夫一妻制。

sentences.en: the database would not include a person's name unless he opted in.
sentences.cn: 除非决定参加，否则数据库将不录入姓名。

sentences.en: the treaty gives any country the right to &B{opt out of} a single currency.
sentences.cn: 条约赋予任何国家退出单一货币的权利。

sentences.en: They opt for more holiday instead of more pay.
sentences.cn: 他们选择了延长假期而不是增加工资.

sentences.en: To keep the cost down, opt for a basic model.
sentences.cn: 要想花钱少些，就选择基本的型号。

sentences.en: Under the agreement the Vietnamese can opt out at any time.
sentences.cn: 依据该协定，越南有权随时选择退出。

sentences.en: Whichever of the fitness classes you opt for, trained instructors are there to help you.
sentences.cn: 不管你选择哪种健身课，都会有专业教练帮助你。

sentences.en: Will individual schools be given the right to opt out of the local school authority?
sentences.cn: 各个学校可能有权选择退出地方教育局 吗 ?

sentences.en: You can always opt out of this email subscription at any time.
sentences.cn: 您可以随时选择退出此邮件订阅在任何时候.
